website_summaries.verdict: By putting a clever spin on traditional upper back designs, this innovative posture brace manages to deliver improved support and a smoother overall user experience.
pros: Offers dual posture correcting action by pulling the shoulders back and providing firm upper back support at the same time
Reduces neck and upper and mid back pain caused by bad posture
Wide torso strap with a front fastening mechanism is easy to put on and adjust without assistance
Ergonomic shoulder straps with extra padding reduce discomfort in the underarm area
cons: More visible under clothing than smaller varieties
We’d like just a little more length on the rigid thoracic support panel

customer_reviews.title: This brace may be the one you are looking for!?!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this posture brace a week ago and I think it works and I do like it. I'm 6'0" tall and weigh 205 lbs. and it fits because you can make adjustments with the straps. There were no issues with the construction of this product. It helps to have someone assist in putting it on and taking it off but it can be done alone also. For the price it's hard to beat. The delivery was fast and on time. I would recommend this brace to family and/or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Helps my posture
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself. I’ve been having a lot of back problems and wanted to try anything and everything! This holds my shoulders back and keeps my posture erect. I can only keep it on for about an hour. Probably because I’m not used to it yet. I’ll keep trying to wear it a little longer each day so I can achieve max benefits.
customer_reviews.author: abojo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase, it does seem to do a much better job than others I have tried and is more comfortable.The wider part of the back piece does a much better job to support your Thoracic area than any other Braces out there. It also works well by actually pulling your shoulder back with a decent pressure on the shoulder and clavicle versus some brands that put a lot of pressure on the clavicle. Seems to be somewhat effective, start slowly and work up.
customer_reviews.author: Rajat Umarji

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Although this is the first and only brace I have purchased it appears to be good quality. Straps are sturdy and the velcro holds fast. I would suggest that both sides of the chest strap have velcro but it hasn’t caused any undo problems to date. I would warn people that the product runs rather large. I have a 42” chest and ordered the XXL which ended up being much to large. The discription read size for 37 and up. Reordered a XL and that works well, and has pleanty of extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Maclin

customer_reviews.title: Don't wear a tanktop
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very tall dog groomer. I was diagnosed with disk degeneration. My issues is with my upper back. I bought this to see if it would help with the progression. It works, and it's not as uncomfortable as I thought. I initially made a mistake of wearing my normal tank top under my smock. By the end of the first day, one of my under arms had the sensation of a sunburn. The other side had broken capillaries. Wearing a t-shirt is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: ... tried a few of these and THIS one I love! It's super soft material (some others have hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few of these and THIS one I love! It's super soft material (some others have hard plastic or velcro where your skin is!), easy to get on and off (also hard to come by), and adjusts well. I'm hoping it will help my neck and posture when baby #2 comes. I plan on wearing it often. I definitely recommend it above the others.
customer_reviews.author: Jschallh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item for the price
customer_reviews.text: This posture corrector has done a good job releiving the pain I get in my mid to upper back. I tend to slump when working at the computor or using my sewing machine. Occationally, I where it when I take our dog on a long walk, because I tend to get pain then, too. I wear it over a tshirt because it does rub a bit under my arms.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S. Driver

customer_reviews.title: posture corrector is a big help
customer_reviews.text: This posture corrector is a big help. I knew my upper back pain was due to my posture. I put it on for about 15 minutes at a time ~ once or twice a day ~ and it helps me during the time I am wearing it and it helps me remember to stand and sit straight after I wear it. It's like it reminds my muscles of the correct posture to have. I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brace
customer_reviews.text: I had been struggling with neck and back aches not being able to sleep. I was desperate to find something that would help with the pain. I’m so glad I found the New Back Posture Corrector. It arrived quick and I immediately put it on and noticed the difference. I wear it at home and in the office and I’m now able to sleep pain free both my neck and back are doing much much better thanks this brace. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LuzM

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t do you much
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant and I needed to purchase something to help me with back support, I read the reviews on this to help me make a decision but when I purchased it and tried it for myself didn’t really do much for me. It’s really flimsy, no support in a total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Angie Franco

customer_reviews.title: Like the design
customer_reviews.text: Like the design! Easy on...easy off. Comfortable to wear. Has a tendency to chafe where strap goes under the arms even though it’s padded. Maybe I need to try adjusting it a little. Assuming that this will not be a problem over time as I get used to wearing it. I would imagine all posture correctors would create the same problem. That’s the only reason I didn’t give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Sizing Chart
customer_reviews.text: Followed the sizing chart, I measured 38.5” so ordered a XL but it was way too big. I Velcro attached to the back of the support. I ended up returning it and going with a different brand that could support lower back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cobian88

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take on and off, definitely reduces and even pain from bad discs in upper back. Much safer than medication with immediate relief. I've bought other brands on Amazon and the build quality and comfort is worth the price. Hope others find relief like I have
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by my son's chiropractor to help with his scoliosis
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my son's chiropractor to help with his scoliosis. So far, this back brace is helping wonderfully. I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lester

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Posture Brace
customer_reviews.text: Really love this posture brace! Very well made, easy to put on and comfortable too. Pretty good price on it. I’d recommend it for others to buy
customer_reviews.author: S Willie

customer_reviews.title: Posture Corrector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for anyone who is concerned about the health of their back/spine. Instead of being invasive and uncomfortable, this brace is more of a “reminder” about keeping proper posture. You certainly know it is there, but it feels good to keep a solid posture.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product for what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product! My job makes me sit down for long hours and I was looking for a product to help me keep my back straight. Not only this product is great for what I wanted, I can also pull down the extended straps for a nice stretch in my shoulders and chest! ( instead of wrapping the extended straps around my chest)
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: It was been very helpful in correcting my posture. I can see and a great deal of improvement in a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: ACSOULMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed at how it instantly corrected my posture and relieved some of my shoulder aches from hunching. I sit at a desk for long hours each day and it reminds me to sit up straight. Sometimes I will sleep with it on and then remove in the middle of the night if it gets a little uncomfortable. Highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable and easy on and off brace by far. I have tried others and they were not easy to get off. You won’t be disappointed. Best by far.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder belt has manufacturing defects
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it has following problems: 1. The plastic bracket broke 2. The sticky patch became ineffective after use 3. I missed return window by 3 days and cannot return and get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Hira Suri

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. It helps with posture but isn't super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, something that finally and truly works! Almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, something that finally and truly works! Almost one full day of work while wearing this and already I can feel the difference and my body says "THANK YOU!"
customer_reviews.author: Julia Leczner

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I really like this product, first because of the material( its soft and it doesnt hurt your under arms) im 5’-09” and 140lb, i bought Size small. Second: it helps to correct your posture during work time, keeps u straight. Cons: in the back, if the rigid vertical were longer as shown in the picture, it would give u more support

customer_reviews.title: Relieves my shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.text: This really supports my posture and my shoulder muscles no longer ache after I have been in my computer fir hours. My pre-K teacher told me about it. No more chiropractor bills!!!

customer_reviews.title: Weak sticky patch and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of using it, the patch got weaken and now it doesn't stick anymore. Not worth the money if it won't last even 6 months. I don't even use it daily. Buyers look for alternative option.

customer_reviews.title: Has helped neck pain!

customer_reviews.text: Comfortable compared to cheaper ones, did not cut into arm pits. It did what it was supposed to do by retraining the shoulder muscles to remain pulled back and therefore prevent slouching.

customer_reviews.title: Great for posture! Get the right size!

customer_reviews.text: I have had this for only about a week but I can truly say it is comfortable and fits well. I actually feel the strain after about 30 mins just proving how badly I needed corrective assistance.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic hook broke while attempting to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The plastic hook on the back broke apart as I tried to tighten the straps. The brace is unusable at this point. I literally received it an hour ago and tried adjusting it to my body before it broke. The fabric material seem high quality but the plastic hook is extremely cheap. I will be returning the item and look for a different brand.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Quality was nice & this product really ...

customer_reviews.title: One of the two snap buttons broke apart at first ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the two snap buttons broke apart at first try-on. The male part of the button detached from the fabric, suggesting that the second snap button may take turn to give way soon! Returned!

I am so glad I decided to buy this one as the other one was super uncomfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Helping back pain and posture!

customer_reviews.title: Fits Big & Tall
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal and it is much more adjustable than the specifications lead on. I am 6'4" and 300 pounds with a chest measurement over 50" and this thing fits fine. That said, being tall since I was 14 years old caused me to develop a slouchy posture. This thing fixes the issue and my upper back feels better after I've been wearing it. That said, the product is a bit on the bulky side so it is noticeable if you wear it beneath a shirt. But I doubt that it is possible to produce this sort of comfort and correction with less bulk. So I didn't remove any stars.
customer_reviews.author: oqeirjq38jo0

customer_reviews.title: It looks and feels like you could hang on it
customer_reviews.text: Fit loose. When I tried to tighten it slightly, the strap split from the hook on the back. It looks and feels like you could hang on it, but the stitching for the strap is weak. The straps could pull a car and it was quite comfortable. It works great but the strap is hanging on by threads.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, with stability and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 previously failed purchases from other vendors, I can't be happy enough with this one. All the problems I had with the previous two, this one fixed them. I really love how the armpit areas don't hurt with long hours of wearing plus it doesn't pull apart due to the snap on the strap. The one I returned from a different vendor kept pulling apart since there was nothing to hold it in place. This is a perfect version! So happy I tried a third time before giving up! This company rocks!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great posture corrector. It is the best !!!

The material is very gentle and soft and the same way easy to adjust keeping your body in the right posture. I love it and definitely recommended.

I sit at a desk for long hours each day and it reminds me to sit up straight. It’s not necessarily comfortable under the clothes. I prefer to wear it over my clothes and under a sweater. It’s easy to put on and take off and can be easily tucked away in a handbag. Recommend for those long hours at the desk.

customer_reviews.text: It did not come far enough down my back to offer the spine support I need.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

product_meta.title: REDESIGNED Back Straightener Posture Corrector for Men-Upper Back Brace Posture for Women- Clavicle Brace Support-Body Wellness Posture Corrector Under Clothes-Spine Alignment (S-M(26"-31.5"))
feature_bullets: ✅EXTRA CERVICAL SUPPORT- Patent Pending Design- If you’re looking for a supportive BACK STRAIGHTENER posture corrector, Odofit Back Posture Corrector are hard to beat. Thanks to their REDESIGNED BACK STRAPS, the Odofit Posture Corrector for women under clothes offer the BEST upper back and thoracic support, being recommended as slouch corrector. A Comfortable back posture corrector for women men for ALL DAY Use.

✅A BREEZE TO PUT ON – Requiring assistance every time you need to put on or take off your body wellness posture corrector is not pleasant. Featuring a BACKPACK DESIGN and an innovative SNAP BUTTON, Odofit Clavicle Brace makes the entire process an easy and HASSLE FREE experience. The back posture corrector for women TREATS and PREVENTS bad computer posture and OFFER posture support and spine corrector. Try the NEW ODOFIT posture brace right now.

✅MINOR ARMPIT DISCOMFORT– Unlike regular back brace posture corrector that cut into your armpits, the ERGONOMIC DESIGN of Odofit back straightener follows the contour of your body. As a bonus, the additional UNDERARMS PADS of the upper back posture corrector make it comfortable for ALL-DAY USE. The Odofit posture corrector back brace is EASY to ADJUST by gently pulling the straps until you feel enough pressure on your shoulders and upper back brace.

✅ UNISEX SIZE- The Odofit back straightener is unisex for both MEN and WOMEN. Refer to last Image for SIZING TABLE. The Back Support for women and back corrector for men can be wear it to prevent further injuries. For a Perfect Fit please check the RED Line that can be found on the stiff part of the long back piece. For Individuals with height under 5’7” please place the Velcro Piece Directly on the red line. For Individuals with height over 5’7” place the Velcro UNDER the RED LINE.

✅ 30 DAYS GUARANTEE– Odofit back support brace have been COMPLETELY REDESIGNED for maximum COMFORT and spine corrector. In the unlikely case that your back brace posture corrector is anything but perfect for you, just send it back within 30 days for a full refund! Enjoy your NEW Posture brace from ODOFIT.
